text: Recently learnt about a new code editor, Zed, from the creators of (the now sunsetted) Atom. It’s still in beta but I’ve been using it today preparing for the C book club and am really liking it so far. Excited to see where they go with it. Looks like it has the potential to compete with VSCode. Currently macOS only though. <https://zed.dev>

attachments.fallback: Zed: Zed - Code at the speed of thought
attachments.text: Code at the speed of thought. Zed is a high-performance, multiplayer code editor from the creators of Atom and Tree-sitter.
attachments.title: Zed - Code at the speed of thought
